newsitem.title: USA: Altris sets name change, reverse split.
newsitem.headline: Altris sets name change, reverse split.

text.p: Altris Software Inc said shareholders approved its name change and reverse stock split at a special meeting held Thursday.
Altris changed its name from "Alpharel Inc" to reflect combination of Alpharel, Optigraphics and Trimco Group plc.
It also announced a 1-for-2 reverse split effective at the close on October 25. With the stock split, Altris will have 9.5 million shares outstanding.
Shareholders of record on October 25 will receive notices on how to exchange existing stock certificates for new certificates reflecting the name change and stock split.
Trading on a post-split basis will begin when trading opens on Monday, October 28, 1996.
